briefTitle: A Comparative Study Between Oncoplastic Breast Surgery and Standard Conservative Surgery:Margin Status and Patient Satisfaction
officialTitle: A Comparative Study Between Oncoplastic Breast Surgery and Standard Conservative Surgery:Margin Status and Patient Satisfaction Among Egyptian Females
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Margins in all specimens measured in millimeters 2.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female Patients with stage 1,2 breast cancer.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients \>60 years.
* Patients with previous breast surgery.
* patients candidate for mastectomy or palliative excision. Patients with collagen disease.
